verse.name: v1
verse.lines: // Father of lights, You delight in Your children. //

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Every good and perfect gift comes from You.
Every good and perfect gift comes from You.
Every good and perfect gift comes from You.
Father of lights.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
// Father of lights, You never change,
You have no turning. //
